title: My mouse randomly freezes ingame?
body:
I'm assuming it's my mouse, I dunno.

I have a Razr Death Adder and ingame at random times, it freezes for 1-5 seconds... it's rather annoying dying by this during teamfights ect...


Only happens on this game

replies.body: Are you able to use your keyboard or other system commands during the time the freezes happen? *CrazFight* and *Rineyy* have provided some good first steps in troubleshooting this, but a bit more info would help us narrow down the exact cause. Thanks!
Lol, isn't intentional, but if I could add something to help, I need to. :D

Its really hard to identify the problem here, but as you said I assume its your mouse, I recommend using another mouse and see if it works then, if it doesn't you can send in a[ Support ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)for help.
